dmca.title: Thai food site stirred up over claimed copying
dmca.body:
google Digital Millennium Copyright Act.txt.	7/25/2005 Digital Millennium Copyright Act

1. Copyrighted work at issue is the following:
a.	text at: http://www.templeofthai.com/food/history thai cuisine.html

If available, a very heavy stone mortar and pestle with at least a 2 cup bowl. is traditional. and. makes a better textured pasta.)

2. Material that is infringing the copyrighted work:

a.	Search terra: introduction to thai food Search result: www.simply-thai.com/thai-food-recipess-introduction.htm

b.	Search term: most of our thai recipes we have included are not elaborate Search result: www.simply-thai.com/thai-food-recipess-inroduction.htm

c.	Search term: Thailand's rerir cal cuisines Search result: www.simply-thai.com/thai-food-recipess-inroduction.htm

d.	Search term: five tastes of thai cuisine Soarch rosult: www.simply-thai.com/thai-food-recipess-inroduction.htm 

e.	Search term: presentation and serving of thai food Search result: www.simply-thai.com/thai-food-recipess-inroduction.htm

f.	Search term: home style thai recipes Search result: www.simply-thai.com/thai-food-recipess-inroduction.htm

h.	Search term: traditional thai curry pastes take a lot of patience Search result: www.simply-thai.com/thai-food-recipes-curry-pastes.htm

Search result: www.simply-thai.com/Thai-Market_ Fruit_Carving_Books-and-tools.htm

President/ Temple of Thai 
bapeng@templeofthai.com

4.	Owner of offending site: Mark Grant
simply.thai@freenet.co.uk

5.	I have good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I Swear under penalty of perjury that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on the behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7.	Signature:
